title: Is elementalist lux out?
body: So on patch 6.23 the notes said that elementalist lux is on the patch however i cant purchase it when i will be able to do it?

replies.body: Is anyone else checking if lux skin is out every hour? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Honestly i am getting really restless just waiting for this skin seriously i just want Elementalist Lux already take my money already riot! i bought 25 dollars worth of RP For this skin ...!
same

> [{quoted}](name=Angel Sama,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5EAAjzPi,comment-id=00650000,timestamp=2016-11-26T23:12:57.917+0000)
>
> same

When a lux main is sad we are all sad.. {{item:3070}}
Us Lux mains must stick together during these difficult trials...

> Us Lux mains must stick together during these difficult trials...

As our Goddess says {{champion:99}} " STAY POSITIVE! "
I'm trying to. ; -;
They are probably going to release Elementalist Lux Tuesday or Wednesday, (The week after patch 6.23) That's kinda what they did for most releases and champions.
Why do you destroy our hopes? {{summoner:3}} {{item:3070}}

this waiting makes me notwnna buy the skin anymore
{{champion:99}} {{item:3070}}
Waiting as well, I have my rp ready to spend :(
Am i the only one who is refreshing this page every 5 seconds lol
still waiting ... riot what are you doing to us we want it and WE WANT IT NOW T-T{{champion:99}} {{item:1056}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
meanwhile i'm just staring at lux's champion profile admiring the damn splash art( i cry ){{item:3070}}

Actually that's not true. All of the other Ultimate tier skins were released before the new month. (typically the day after patch day.) The only one close to the beginning of a new month was Pulsefire Ez on the 29th of June. SG Udyr was February 17th and Dj Sona was July 25th. One Tuesday, one Wednesday, and one Friday. Fact checking :P Lux will probably be out tomorrow, Friday the 25th.
So today?! Yay..! XD I'll try not to get my hopes up though. I've been filled with dissapointment already. I hope it is released today. Cx

i feel the exact same way. it's now the 26th and still no lux skin :'(

its riot wut the hell do u want from them 
it was to much for their lil'hands to handle the season the teemo skin and the ultimate skin
I just want to open the client and see Lux's beautiful face not Talon's butt >:v

I dont care if its tomorrow. -_- 
They said today so it should be out today... Im so mad {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

NOW I KNOW WHAT RITO IS DOING

BECAUSE OF HOW STRESSED I AM FROM WAITING I STARTED BUYING MORE RP TO CALM DOWN BY PLAYING WITH OTHER SKINS

IT'S BEEN THEIR PLAN ALL ALONG

plot twist
the guy saying they mistook the date is actually right and we are all living a lie

and rito is illuminati

Most of us have been waiting over a month...RIP.
I love our little comunity <3
It will never come out.-_- if it doesnt come out today I've wasted my time.. I hate rito...
sup guys, been reading this "chat" for about 3 hours...can I join ? :D
Btw when the skin will finally be released...I will miss you guys :( We went through a lot!
